column5: Our new home is in TechRidge in northeast Austin. Near downtown, Formula One, lake Travis, the greenbelt, and the Domain, our location is great for all visitors! Enjoy 24/7 keyless entry, a Queen sized tempurpedic bed with luxury linens, a personal Keurig, a mini refrigerator, a spotlessly clean private bathroom with soft, fluffy towels, and a flatscreen tv with Apple TV in your room. All races, ethnicities, religions, genders, sexualities, and nationalities welcomed. We can't wait to meet you!
column8: Bright, clean, & welcome space in Austin
